Articles.Content: Just like the title says, I need to know how to remove a contract (to be specific, the rescue contracts. I just don't like the idea someone else is launching rockets on my Kerbin ). Any tips?
There should be a red stop sign on the right hand side where you can decline the contract.
I mean to delete it from the game entirely. (If there isn't a way to do this, I can always do that.)
Mission Controller 2 gives you an option to turn off these contracts.
